titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation to represse all piracies and depredations vpon the sea
Proclamations.1603-09-30
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Giuen at his Maiesties citie of Winchester the xxx. day of September 1603. in the first yeere of his Highnes reigne of England, France and Ireland, and of Scotland the seuen and thirtieth.
Arms 8; Steele notation: ma- lars 2) any to.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
